Class Table

java.lang.Object
java.util.Observable
engine.forGUI.Table
public final class Table extends Observable
The Table class represents the main user interface for the Capstone chess engine. It creates a graphical chess board using Swing components and provides various features such as a menu bar, game history panel, debug panel, and AI integration. The class follows the singleton pattern to ensure only one instance exists.
Author:
Aaron Ho, dareTo81

    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    private static class 
    Table.AIThinkTank
    The AIThinkTank class is an asynchronous worker responsible for AI move calculation and execution.
    (package private) static enum 
    Table.BoardDirection
    The BoardDirection enumeration represents the two possible directions of the chess board display.
    private class 
    Table.BoardPanel
    The BoardPanel class represents a graphical panel displaying the chess board and its tiles.
    static class 
    Table.MoveLog
    The MoveLog class represents a log of moves made during a chess game.
    (package private) static enum 
    Table.PlayerType
    The PlayerType enumeration represents the types of players in the chess game.
    private static class 
    Table.TableGameAIWatcher
    The TableGameAIWatcher class observes changes in the game state and triggers AI actions or displays game-over messages based on certain conditions.
    private class 
    Table.TilePanel
    The TilePanel class represents a graphical panel for an individual tile on the chessboard.

  • Constructor Details

    • Table

      private Table()
      Constructs an instance of the Table class, creating the main graphical user interface. Initializes and configures various components including the game frame, menu bar, chess board, game history panel, debug panel, and game setup options.

  • Method Details

    • get

      public static Table get()
      Retrieves the singleton instance of the Table class.
      Returns:
      The singleton instance of the Table class.

    • getGameBoard

      private Board getGameBoard()
      Retrieves the Board object representing the current state of the chess board.
      Returns:

    • getHighlightLegalMoves

      private boolean getHighlightLegalMoves()
      Retrieves the current status of legal move highlighting on the chess board.
      Returns:
      True if legal move highlighting is enabled, false otherwise.

    • show

      public void show()
      Refreshes and updates the graphical user interface to reflect the current game state. Updates the game history panel, redraws the chess board, and updates the debug panel.

    • populateMenuBar

      private void populateMenuBar(JMenuBar tableMenuBar)
      Populates the menu bar with Preferences and Options menus.
      Parameters:
      tableMenuBar - The JMenuBar to populate.

    • center

      private static void center(JFrame frame)
      Centers the provided JFrame on the screen.
      Parameters:
      frame - The JFrame to be centered.

    • createOptionsMenu

      private JMenu createOptionsMenu()
      Creates a JMenu with options to interact with the game. Includes starting a new game, evaluating the board, inspecting game state, undoing moves, and setting up game parameters.
      Returns:
      The JMenu containing gameplay options.

    • createPreferencesMenu

      private JMenu createPreferencesMenu()
      Creates a JMenu with options for customizing user preferences and settings. Users can choose tile colors, chess piece images, highlight legal moves, and toggle book moves usage.
      Returns:
      The JMenu containing user preferences and settings.

    • playerInfo

      private static String playerInfo(Player player)
      Constructs a string containing details about the given player's alliance, legal moves, check status, checkmate status, and castling status.
      Parameters:
      player - The player for which to generate the information.
      Returns:
      A string representation of the player's status and legal moves.

    • updateGameBoard

      private void updateGameBoard(Board board)
      Updates the internal state of the chess game's board to match the provided board.
      Parameters:
      board - The new board configuration to be applied to the game.

    • updateComputerMove

      private void updateComputerMove(Move move)
      Updates the internal state of the computer's chosen move.
      Parameters:
      move - The move chosen by the computer player.

    • undoAllMoves

      private void undoAllMoves()
      Reverses all moves that have been made in the current game session. Effectively resets the game to its initial state.

    • undoLastMove

      private void undoLastMove()
      Removes the last move from the move log and updates the game board state. Clears the computer move and refreshes UI components.

    • moveMadeUpdate

      private void moveMadeUpdate(Table.PlayerType playerType)
      Sets the state as changed and notifies registered observers with the specified player type.
      Parameters:
      playerType - The type of player (Human or Computer) who made the move.

    • setupUpdate

      private void setupUpdate(GameSetup gameSetup)
      Sets the state as changed and notifies registered observers with the game setup configuration.
      Parameters:
      gameSetup - The updated game setup configuration.
